name: Startup Grind: Bangkok - Founder Stories
description: Hear inspiring stories and insights from local startup founders. Connect with entrepreneurs, investors, and mentors in Bangkok's vibrant startup ecosystem.

name: Tech Talk Night: Future of AI in Marketing
description: Join us for an insightful evening discussing the transformative role of Artificial Intelligence in the future of marketing. Network with industry professionals and learn about the latest trends.

name: Freelancer Meetup: Level Up Your Pitch
description: Connect with fellow freelancers in Bangkok and join our interactive workshop on crafting compelling pitches that win clients. Share experiences and grow your network.
